jabber.remoting.Connection

type
class
implements
haxe.remoting.AsyncConnection
Dynamic
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
HaXe remoting connection to an XMPP entity.
User ServiceDiscovery to determine if an entity supports haXe-remoting.
http://haxe.org/doc/remoting

Static Methods

create(stream : jabber.Stream, target : String) : Connection

Instance Variables

stream(default,null) : jabber.Stream

target : String

JID of current active entity
